verses.verse: ( Jehu Anointed King of Israel) וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> we·’ĕ·lî·šā‘ Now Elisha הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> han·nā·ḇî the prophet קָרָ֕א <WH7121> qā·rā summoned לְאַחַ֖ד <WH259> lə·’a·ḥaḏ one מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> mib·bə·nê of the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <WH5030> han·nə·ḇî·’îm of the prophets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and said ל֜וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to him, חֲגֹ֣ר 2296 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( ḥă·ḡōr) “ Tuck your cloak מָתְנֶ֗יךָ 4975 N-mdc│2ms ( mā·ṯə·ne·ḵā) under your belt, וְ֠קַח 3947 Conj-w│V-Qal-Imp-ms ( wə·qaḥ) take פַּ֣ךְ 6378 N-msc ( paḵ) flask הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן 8081 Art│N-ms ( haš·še·men) of oil הַזֶּה֙ 2088 Art│Pro-ms ( haz·zeh) this בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│2ms ( bə·yā·ḏe·ḵā) -, וְלֵ֖ךְ 1980 Conj-w│V-Qal-Imp-ms ( wə·lêḵ) and go רָמֹ֥ת 7418 N-proper-fs ( rā·mōṯ) to Ramoth-gilead. גִּלְעָֽד׃ 1568 N-proper-fs ( gil·‘āḏ) ...

וּבָ֖אתָ <WH935> ū·ḇā·ṯā When you arrive שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> šām·māh ..., וּרְאֵֽה־ <WH7200> ū·rə·’ê·hō·šā- look שָׁ֠ם <WH8033> m ... יֵה֨וּא <WH3058> yê·hū for Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <WH3092> yə·hō·wō·šā·p̄āṭ of Jehoshaphat, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son נִמְשִׁ֗י <WH5250> nim·šî of Nimshi. וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> ū·ḇā·ṯā Go in, וַהֲקֵֽמֹתוֹ֙ <WH6965> wa·hă·qê·mō·ṯōw get him away מִתּ֣וֹך <WH8432> mit·tōḵ from אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> ’e·ḥāw his companions, וְהֵבֵיאתָ֥ <WH935> wə·hê·ḇê·ṯā and take אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw him חֶ֥דֶר <WH2315> ḥe·ḏer to an inner room בְּחָֽדֶר׃ <WH2315> bə·ḥā·ḏer ....

וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> wə·lā·qaḥ·tā Then take פַךְ־ <WH6378> p̄aḵ- the flask הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> haš·še·men of oil, וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <WH3332> wə·yā·ṣaq·tā pour עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- it on רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> rō·šōw his head, וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and declare, כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> kōh- ‘ This is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <WH4886> mə·šaḥ·tî·ḵā I anoint לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> lə·me·leḵ you king אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl Israel. ’ וּפָתַחְתָּ֥ <WH6605> ū·p̄ā·ṯaḥ·tā Then open הַדֶּ֛לֶת <WH1817> had·de·leṯ the door וְנַ֖סְתָּה <WH5127> wə·nas·tāh and run. וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō Do not תְחַכֶּֽה׃ <WH2442> ṯə·ḥak·keh delay! ”

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <WH1980> way·yê·leḵ went הַנַּ֛עַר <WH5288> han·na·‘ar So the young הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> han·na·‘ar ... הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> han·nā·ḇî prophet רָמֹ֥ת <WH7418> rā·mōṯ to Ramoth-gilead, גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> gil·‘āḏ ...

וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō and when he arrived, וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh there. שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> śā·rê commanders הַחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> ha·ḥa·yil the army יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <WH3427> yō·šə·ḇîm were sitting וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer he said. דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> dā·ḇār “ I have a message לִ֛י Prep│1cs ( lî) אֵלֶ֖יךָ 413 Prep│2ms ( ’ê·le·ḵā) for you, הַשָּׂ֑ר 8269 Art│N-ms ( haś·śār) commander, ” וַיֹּ֤אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) asked יֵהוּא֙ 3058 N-proper-ms ( yê·hū) Jehu. אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) “ For מִ֣י 4310 Interrog ( mî) which מִכֻּלָּ֔נוּ 3605 Prep-m│N-msc│1cp ( mik·kul·lā·nū) of us? ” וַיֹּ֖אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) he replied. אֵלֶ֥יךָ 413 Prep│2ms ( ’ê·le·ḵā) “ For you, הַשָּֽׂר׃ 8269 Art│N-ms ( haś·śār) commander, ”

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> way·yā·qām So Jehu got up וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō and went הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> hab·bay·ṯāh into the house, וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> way·yi·ṣōq where the young prophet poured הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> haš·še·men the oil אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> rō·šōw his head וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and declared ל֗וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) , כֹּֽה־ 3541 Adv ( kōh-) “ This is what אָמַ֤ר 559 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ’ā·mar) says: יְהוָה֙ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD, אֱלֹהֵ֣י 430 N-mpc ( ’ĕ·lō·hê) the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of Israel, מְשַׁחְתִּ֧יךָֽ 4886 V-Qal-Perf-1cs│2ms ( mə·šaḥ·tî·ḵā) ‘ I anoint you לְמֶ֛לֶךְ 4428 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·me·leḵ) king אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) over עַ֥ם 5971 N-msc ( ‘am) people יְהוָ֖ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD’s אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) ... יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) Israel.

וְהִ֨כִּיתָ֔ה <WH5221> wə·hik·kî·ṯāh And you are to strike down אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> bêṯ the house אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> ’aḥ·’āḇ Ahab, אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·ne·ḵā of your master וְנִקַּמְתִּ֞י <WH5358> wə·niq·qam·tî so that I may avenge דְּמֵ֣י׀ <WH1818> də·mê the blood עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> ‘ă·ḇā·ḏay of My servants הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <WH5030> han·nə·ḇî·’îm the prophets וּדְמֵ֛י <WH1818> ū·ḏə·mê and the blood כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- of all עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> ‘aḇ·ḏê the servants יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mî·yaḏ [shed] by the hand אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <WH348> ’î·zā·ḇel of Jezebel.

וְאָבַ֖ד <WH6> wə·’ā·ḇaḏ will perish, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- The whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> ’aḥ·’āḇ of Ahab וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> wə·hiḵ·rat·tî and I will cut off לְאַחְאָב֙ <WH256> lə·’aḥ·’āḇ from Ahab מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <WH8366> maš·tîn every male בְּקִ֔יר <WH7023> bə·qîr ..., ( Literally (all) those who urinate against a wall) וְעָצ֥וּר <WH6113> wə·‘ā·ṣūr both slave וְעָז֖וּב <WH5800> wə·‘ā·zūḇ and free, בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> bə·yiś·rā·’êl in Israel.

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> wə·nā·ṯat·tî I will make אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ the house אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> ’aḥ·’āḇ of Ahab כְּבֵ֖ית <WH1004> kə·ḇêṯ like the houses יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> yā·rā·ḇə·‘ām of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son נְבָ֑ט <WH5028> nə·ḇāṭ of Nebat וּכְבֵ֖ית <WH1004> ū·ḵə·ḇêṯ [and] בַּעְשָׁ֥א <WH1201> ba‘·šā Baasha בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <WH281> ’ă·ḥî·yāh of Ahijah.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- And אִיזֶ֜בֶל <WH348> ’î·ze·ḇel Jezebel, יֹאכְל֧וּ <WH398> yō·ḵə·lū will devour הַכְּלָבִ֛ים <WH3611> hak·kə·lā·ḇîm the dogs בְּחֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> bə·ḥê·leq on the plot [of ground] יִזְרְעֶ֖אל <WH3157> yiz·rə·‘el at Jezreel וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> wə·’ên and [there will be] no one קֹבֵ֑ר <WH6912> qō·ḇêr to bury [her]. ’” וַיִּפְתַּ֥ח <WH6605> way·yip̄·taḥ Then the young prophet opened הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> had·de·leṯ the door וַיָּנֹֽס׃ <WH5127> way·yā·nōs and ran.

וְיֵה֗וּא <WH3058> wə·yê·hū When Jehu יָצָא֙ <WH3318> yā·ṣā went out אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> ‘aḇ·ḏê the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw of his master, וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer they asked לוֹ֙ Prep│3ms ( lōw) , הֲשָׁל֔וֹם 7965 Art│N-ms ( hă·šā·lō·wm) “ Is everything all right? מַדּ֛וּעַ 4069 Interrog ( mad·dū·a‘) Why בָּֽא־ 935 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( bā-) come הַמְשֻׁגָּ֥ע 7696 Art│V-Pual-Prtcpl-ms ( ham·šug·gā‘) madman הַזֶּ֖ה 2088 Art│Pro-ms ( haz·zeh) did this אֵלֶ֑יךָ 413 Prep│2ms ( ’ê·le·ḵā) to you? ” וַיֹּ֣אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) he replied אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם 413 Prep│3mp ( ’ă·lê·hem) .... אַתֶּ֛ם 859 Pro-2mp ( ’at·tem) “ You יְדַעְתֶּ֥ם 3045 V-Qal-Perf-2mp ( yə·ḏa‘·tem) know אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הָאִ֖ישׁ 376 Art│N-ms ( hā·’îš) his kind וְאֶת־ 853 Conj-w│DirObjM ( wə·’eṯ-) - שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ 7879 N-msc│3ms ( śî·ḥōw) and their babble, ”

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> way·yō·mə·rū they said. שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> še·qer “ That is a lie! ” הַגֶּד־ <WH5046> hag·geḏ- “ Tell נָ֖א <WH4994> nā now! ” לָ֑נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us וַיֹּ֗אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) So Jehu answered, כָּזֹ֤את 2063 Prep-k│Pro-fs ( kā·zōṯ) about this וְכָזֹאת֙ 2063 Conj-w, Prep-k│Pro-fs ( wə·ḵā·zōṯ) and that, אָמַ֤ר 559 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ’ā·mar) “ He talked אֵלַי֙ 413 Prep│1cs ( ’ê·lay) to me לֵאמֹ֔ר 559 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lê·mōr) and he said, כֹּ֚ה 3541 Adv ( kōh) ‘ This is what אָמַ֣ר 559 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ’ā·mar) says: יְהוָ֔ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ 4886 V-Qal-Perf-1cs│2ms ( mə·šaḥ·tî·ḵā) I anoint לְמֶ֖לֶךְ 4428 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·me·leḵ) you king אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) Israel. ’”

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <WH4116> way·ma·hă·rū Quickly, וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> way·yiq·ḥū took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš each man בִּגְד֔וֹ <WH899> biḡ·ḏōw his garment וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> way·yā·śî·mū and put [it] תַחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> ṯaḥ·tāw under [Jehu] אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- on גֶּ֣רֶם <WH1634> ge·rem the bare הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> ham·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ steps. וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <WH8628> way·yiṯ·qə·‘ū Then they blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <WH7782> baš·šō·w·p̄ār the ram’s horn וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> way·yō·mə·rū and proclaimed, מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> mā·laḵ is king! ” יֵהֽוּא׃ <WH3058> yê·hū “ Jehu

וַיִּתְקַשֵּׁ֗ר <WH7194> way·yiṯ·qaš·šêr conspired ( Jehu Kills Joram and Ahaziah) ( 140 22:8-9) יֵה֛וּא 3058 N-proper-ms ( yê·hū) Thus Jehu בֶּן־ 1121 N-msc ( ben-) son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט 3092 N-proper-ms ( yə·hō·wō·šā·p̄āṭ) of Jehoshaphat, בֶּן־ 1121 N-msc ( ben-) the son נִמְשִׁ֖י 5250 N-proper-ms ( nim·šî) of Nimshi, אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) against יוֹרָ֑ם 3141 N-proper-ms ( yō·w·rām) Joram. וְיוֹרָם֩ 3141 Conj-w│N-proper-ms ( wə·yō·w·rām) ( Now Joram הָיָ֨ה 1961 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( hā·yāh) had been שֹׁמֵ֜ר 8104 V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( šō·mêr) defending בְּרָמֹ֣ת 7418 Prep-b│N-proper-fs ( bə·rā·mōṯ) Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֗ד 1568 N-proper-fs ( gil·‘āḏ) ... ה֚וּא 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) - וְכָל־ 3605 Conj-w│N-msc ( wə·ḵāl) and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) Israel מִפְּנֵ֥י 6440 Prep-m│N-cpc ( mip·pə·nê) against חֲזָאֵ֖ל 2371 N-proper-ms ( ḥă·zā·’êl) Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ 4428 N-msc ( me·leḵ-) king אֲרָֽם׃ 758 N-proper-fs ( ’ă·rām) of Aram,

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <WH7725> way·yā·šāḇ had returned יְהוֹרָ֨ם <WH3088> yə·hō·w·rām Joram ( Or Jehoram, a variant of Joram; also in verses 17, 21, 22, 23, and 24) הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham·me·leḵ but King לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <WH7495> lə·hiṯ·rap·pê to recover בִיְזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> ḇiy·zə·rə·‘el to Jezreel מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמַּכִּים֙ <WH4347> ham·mak·kîm the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יַכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5221> yak·ku·hū he had suffered אֲרַמִּ֔ים <WH761> ’ă·ram·mîm [at the hands] of the Arameans בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <WH3898> bə·hil·lā·ḥă·mōw in the battle אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- against חֲזָאֵ֖ל <WH2371> ḥă·zā·’êl Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> me·leḵ their king אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> ’ă·rām .... ) וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said, יֵהוּא֙ <WH3058> yê·hū So Jehu אִם־ <WH518> ’im- “ If יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> yêš ... נַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <WH5315> nap̄·šə·ḵem you commanders wish to make me king, אַל־ <WH408> ’al- then do not יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> yê·ṣê let anyone פָלִיט֙ <WH6412> p̄ā·lîṭ escape מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> hā·‘îr the city לָלֶ֖כֶת <WH1980> lā·le·ḵeṯ to go לַגִּיד <WH5046> lag·gīḏ and tell [it] בְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> bə·yiz·rə·‘el in Jezreel. ”
